location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch of Country Round Shaiba To Illustrate Actions of April 12th to 14th From Sketches by Captain Day R.A. Lieutenants Hall, Norfolks, & others. Panoramas by Captain Wingate R.A.’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:613 x 590 mm, on sheet 747 x 655 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:General Staff India. S.D.O. No. 1247, June, 1915.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by form lines at 5 feet intervals.Map of Shaiba and vicinity produced to illustrate the movements of British and Turkish military forces between the 12th and 14th April 1915. Shows the position of various brigades with location of trenches, guns and picquets marked and labelled for reference. Bottom right hand corner: ‘(Sd.) B.G. Peel, Captain, G.S.O. (3) 6th Division, Shaiba, 21-4-15’.Marked ‘For Official Use Only’.Oriented with west to the top.Inscriptions:In red ink top margin at the right-hand corner: 'Map IV'.
